name: DungeonFight
description:
The game that leads into the full release of Worldcube. 

This is DungeonFight, fight in 1v1 battles through dungeons, against a friend or join a lobby against other players, or if that is too much to handle you can fight a bot or even play alone!

DungeonFight will include a full version of "Worldcube" when it comes out, you will not need to buy "Worldcube" if you buy DungeonFight now.

Coming Soon:

  • 2v2, 3v3, maybe 5v5?
  • Bot games
  • A more fleshed out building system, building parts will lock on to each other etc
  • More pets besides Crabs - Turtles;)?
  • Shop - (You currently gain currency per game but it is not displayed yet)
  • More Cosmetic options
  • Magic
  • New Bosses/Boss rooms
  • New Rooms
  • Better Talents

Make sure to tell me if you experience something bad/buggy, i will try to fix it as soon as possible. 

Some of the pictures are from earlier development and may look different now, but i think they still look cool and still give the general vibe of the game.
